color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Regulators / Partners
- Compliance Authorities
- Government Agencies
- Trade Partners

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Exporters / Importers
- B2B Organizational Users
- Trade Operations Teams
- Supply Chain Managers

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Buyers / Traders
- Corporate Buyers
- Commodity Traders
- Financial Institutions

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Payment Providers & Wallets
- Banking Partners
- Digital Wallet Providers
- Payment Gateways

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Frontend Application
React / Next.js Framework
Redux State Management
Polkadot.js Integration
Responsive PWA Design

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Marketplace API
Product Listings Management
Search & Discovery Engine
RFQ Processing
Order Workflows

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Listings Service
Product Catalog
Inventory Management
Pricing Engine

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Search Service
Elasticsearch Integration
Faceted Search
Recommendations

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
RFQ Service
Quote Management
Bid Processing
Negotiation Workflow

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Messaging Service

Notifications
Document Sharing

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Ratings Service
Reputation System
Review Management
Dispute Resolution

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Order Management
Order Lifecycle
Fulfillment Tracking
Status Updates

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Backend API Gateway
Node.js / NestJS Framework
RESTful API & GraphQL
Rate Limiting & Caching

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Authentication Service
JWT/OAuth2 Implementation
Multi-factor Authentication

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
KYC/AML Engine
Identity Verification
Sanctions Screening
Risk Assessment

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Ricardian Contract Engine
Template Management
Digital Signatures
Legal Compliance

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Settlement Service
Payment Orchestration
Escrow Management
Transaction Routing

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Blockchain Connector
Polkadot RPC Integration
Smart Contract Interactions
Event Listening

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
IPFS Document Storage
- Encrypted Document Repository
- Digital Asset Storage
- Audit Trail Documents

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PostgreSQL Database
- User Profiles & Permissions
- Transaction Records
- Trade Workflow State
- Audit Logs & Compliance Data

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Redis Cache Layer
- Session Management
- API Response Caching
- Real-time Data Updates

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Smart Contracts Layer
Substrate-based Contracts
Cross-chain Compatibility

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
USDC Settlement Contract
Stablecoin Payments
Multi-currency Support
Atomic Swaps

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Ricardian Contract Proofs
On-chain Notarization
Legal Evidence Storage
Timestamp Verification

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Escrow Smart Contract
Multi-signature Escrow
Conditional Releases
Dispute Resolution

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Event Bus & Message Queue
RabbitMQ/Kafka Implementation
Event-driven Architecture
Message Persistence

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Off-chain Workers
- Data Synchronization
- Settlement Automation
- Arbitration Processes
- Notification Services

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Kubernetes Cluster
DigitalOcean Managed Kubernetes
Auto-scaling Groups
Load Balancer Configuration

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Security & Key Management
HashiCorp Vault / KMS
SOC2/ISO 27001 Compliance
Real-time Monitoring & Alerts

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
CI/CD Pipeline
GitHub Actions Workflows
Docker Containerization
Automated Testing & Deployment
